transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji good afternoon sir main Aishwarya Singh baat kar raha tha India Mart se senior manager kaise hain aap
Customer: Han ji han ji
Executive: Sir aapka bhi call customer care pe gaya tha thodi der pehle kuch lead se related
Customer: Sorry
Executive: Han ji han ji
Customer: Right wo exact kya issue hai sir matlab jo hamare keyword dale na products products mein kuch thoda modification kiya tha
Executive: Theek hai
Customer: AI ka help leke to humne changes kiye the ki hame ye sara chahiye configuration jisse hamari leads ki quality improve ho paye pehle bhi thi abhi ek mahine se hamari leads aap check karenge use hi nahi ho pa rahi hai show hi nahi hoti jo hamari leads hai usse regarding leads hi nahi aa rahi
Customer: Meri sari leads waste ja rahi hai collapse ho rahi hai sari
Executive: Okay to sabse pehle to jo keywords aapke account mein added hai majorly jo main keywords hai to wo digital marketing solution service instagram marketing website development service website main bata deta hu primary aap uske according brief kariyega ki kya hame modification karna chahiye hamara primary 70 to 80% kam website designing aur software ka hai
Customer: Right
Executive: 80% majority to hame maximum leads usi ki chahiye digital marketing bhi hum karte hain lekin wo thoda kam part hai and jo instagram marketing ki lead maximum time dikhti hai ki shares kharid lo likes kharid lo wo hum karte hi nahi hai
Executive: Okay yes to hum karte hi nahi hai
Customer: To hum karte hi nahi hai
Executive: Sir sorry
Customer: Laravel technology
Executive: Laravel Laravel
Customer: Okay to ye ye aapke software mein aata hai
Customer: Han ji sir jo aapne bataya aur iske alava fir website ho gaya han ji and SEO digital marketing graphic designing ye aapka 10 15% ka hi part hai
Customer: 10 15% ka part hai jo hamara 70% 80% part hai jisko hum karte hain uski hamare pass leads hi nahi aa rahi aap dekho last capture leads mein
Executive: To ye aap hi dekhte hain team hai koi main hi dekhta hu
Executive: Okay matlab aapke alava koi aur use nahi karta
Customer: Nahi
Executive: Theek hai and India Mart kitna frequently open karke aap check karte ho kuch idea denge
Customer: Within one hour
Executive: Okay theek hai one hour two hour ke andar office hours mein to hota hi hai check okay to office hours mein har ek ek ghante do ghante mein har ek ghante do ghante mein hum karte hain right
Customer: Han ji
Executive: Theek hai to abhi ye phone pe check karte hain ki system se
Customer: Laptop se
Executive: Laptop se abhi hai laptop pe main abhi to main lunch pe hu
Executive: To aap mere ko please fir thoda time bataye jis pe main aapko mujhe 145 ke aas pass call kar lijiye
Executive: 145
Executive: Theek hai main system pe hi hounga fir batayega abhi aap itna research kar lijiye jo bhi aapko kamiyan lagti hai ki ye cheez improve karni hai
Customer: Han matlab aapne jo cheez mujhe batayi main ek bar wo pura go through kar leta hu na aur usme ye hai ki mere liye
Executive: Dekhiye pehle dekhiye main bata raha hu aapko humne abhi package upgrade karwaya hai is iska usse pehle jab hamare pass tha to leads theek aa rahi thi aur upgrade karne ke baad bhi first month mein leads theek aayi hai aap dekhenge meri puri puri use by leads use ho jati thi
Executive: Jab aap check karenge main consume kar leta tha lekin ab to 20 20 leads hamari waste ja rahi hai
Customer: Pehle ki comparison mein na aur wo bhi majorly abhi last month se hi dip hona shuru hua hai
Customer: Han ji
Executive: Theek hai aap kar lijiye sir aap lunch kar lo na ek bar main 22 ke beech mein ek bar connect kar leta hu aapko tab tak main ek bar aapka account go through kar leta hu aur website develop aap comparison ke liye na ek do competitors ka bhi check kar lijiyega
Customer: Theek hai ji
Executive: Sure I am to competitors jiska main dekhta hu nahi naam to main aise kya bataunga matlab aap same business line dekh lijiye na aapko nahi pata aapke pass kon kon listed hai same IT jaise website ka kam hai aap website ke kam ko base leke uski base pe aur dekh lijiye kon kon companies aati hai north India ki
Customer: To aapke paas hai sir
Executive: Theek hai main Delhi vagarah ki koi na koi registered hogi to main Delhi ka ek bar check kar lunga na comparison han han ji theek hai ji main check karke connect karta hu okay okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not being utilized properly.

- Leads related to website designing and software are not coming.

- Most leads are related to Instagram marketing.



Resolution:

- Executive noted the customer's concerns.

- Executive will check the account.

- Executive will connect again after lunch.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 1:45 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, website designing, software, digital marketing
